message: Disclaimer: I am not a certified architect or construction professional. The following floor plan is generated based on general guidelines and principles of Indian residential design, including local building norms and Vastu Shastra. Please consult with certified professionals before implementing any designs.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large entrance area with a foyer to welcome guests.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room for joint family gatherings with ample seating and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Connected to the kitchen, suitable for family meals and celebrations.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen designed with modern amenities in compliance with local building codes.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage area for cleaning supplies and other utilities.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Conveniently placed near the entrance for guests.

openings.description: Spacious balcony overlooking the street and garden, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
